results.title: Pre-extinction activation of hippocampal AMPK prevents fear renewal in mice.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, we also found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a first-line antidiabetic drug, was capable of preventing @<m>DISEASE_Pathophobia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000719212 @@@fear@@@ renewal in male @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by stimulating AMPK in dorsal hippocampus.

citations.NLM: Wang CM, Zhang YF, Lin ZQ, Cai YF, Fu XY, Lin ZH. Pre-extinction activation of hippocampal AMPK prevents fear renewal in mice. Pharmacol Res. 2020 Nov;161():105099. PMID: 32739427
